meanings.definition: The quality or state of being glassy.
meanings.sent1: The glassinesses of the window made it difficult to see through.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the unique glassinesses of the vase in their painting.
meanings.sent3: The glassinesses of the pond made it look like a giant mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a certain glassinesses that hinted at hidden emotions.
meanings.sent5: The glassinesses of the ice made it seem like a magical crystal.

meanings.definition: The appearance or texture of glass.
meanings.sent1: The glassinesses of the table made it look sleek and modern.
meanings.sent2: The glassinesses of the mirror reflected the room perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The glassinesses of the sculpture made it seem fragile yet strong.
meanings.sent4: The glassinesses of the lake at sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The glassinesses of the bottle made it stand out on the shelf.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being transparent like glass.
meanings.sent1: The glassinesses of the crystal-clear water was inviting.
meanings.sent2: The glassinesses of the window allowed the sunlight to flood the room.
meanings.sent3: The glassinesses of her intentions were evident in her honest eyes.
meanings.sent4: The glassinesses of the diamond sparkled in the light.
meanings.sent5: The glassinesses of the air balloon made it seem weightless in the sky.
